amendatorysection.para: Any term shall have the same meaning as used in Chapter 77, article 27.

annotation.para: Any term used in the Nebraska Advantage Act shall have the same meaning as used in chapter 77, article 27, of Nebraska's statutes. Ash Grove Cement Co. v. Nebraska Dept. of Rev., 306 Neb. 947, 947 N.W.2d 731 (2020).
